mapper.select: select count(*) from gas_boiler where name REGEXP #{val}

update gas_boiler
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ratedPower = #{ratedPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
eff = #{eff,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lifetime = #{lifetime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
factory = #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fBuildCost1 = #{fBuildCost1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fBuildCost2 = #{fBuildCost2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fBuildCost3 = #{fBuildCost3,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fBuildCost4 = #{fBuildCost4,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rBuildCost1 = #{rBuildCost1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rBuildCost2 = #{rBuildCost2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rBuildCost3 = #{rBuildCost3,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rBuildCost4 = #{rBuildCost4,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
operCost1 = #{operCost1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
operCost2 = #{operCost2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
operCost3 = #{operCost3,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
operCost4 = #{operCost4,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
number1 = #{number1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number2 = #{number2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number3 = #{number3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number4 = #{number4,jdbcType=INTEGER},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gas_boiler set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ratedPower = #{ratedPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, eff = #{eff,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lifetime = #{lifetime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, factory = #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fBuildCost1 = #{fBuildCost1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fBuildCost2 = #{fBuildCost2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fBuildCost3 = #{fBuildCost3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fBuildCost4 = #{fBuildCost4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rBuildCost1 = #{rBuildCost1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rBuildCost2 = #{rBuildCost2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rBuildCost3 = #{rBuildCost3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rBuildCost4 = #{rBuildCost4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operCost1 = #{operCost1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operCost2 = #{operCost2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operCost3 = #{operCost3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operCost4 = #{operCost4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, number1 = #{number1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number2 = #{number2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number3 = #{number3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number4 = #{number4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
